Uses of ShoutEngine in edu.cuny.cat.market.matching
 

Subclasses of ShoutEngine in edu.cuny.cat.market.matching
 class AdaptiveThetaShoutEngine
          An adaptive version of ThetaShoutEngine in which theta starts at 0 and increases in the later rounds of a day so as to increase transaction volume and avoid making intra-marginal traders extremely unhappy at the same time.
 class FourHeapShoutEngine
           This class provides auction shout management services using the 4-Heap algorithm.
 class GradMaxVolumeShoutEngine
           TODO: has yet to be done !
 class LazyMaxVolumeShoutEngine
           This class provides a matching policy that differs from FourHeapShoutEngine in the sense that it maximizes the matching quantity by pairing high intra-marginal shouts with extra-marginal shouts.
 class ThetaShoutEngine
           This class represents a continuum of shout matching policies, including FourHeapShoutEngine and LazyMaxVolumeShoutEngine.
 

Uses of ShoutEngine in edu.cuny.cat.market.quoting
 

Methods in edu.cuny.cat.market.quoting with parameters of type ShoutEngine
 double SpreadBasedQuotingPolicy.askQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the ask quote as the minimum of the lowest unmatched ask and the lowest matched bid.
 double SingleSidedQuotingPolicy.askQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the ask quote as the lowest unmatched ask.
abstract  double QuotingPolicy.askQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the ask quote
 double DoubleSidedQuotingPolicy.askQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the ask quote as the minimum of the lowest unmatched ask and the lowest matched bid.
 double SpreadBasedQuotingPolicy.bidQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the bid quote as the maximum of the highest matched ask and the highest unmatched bid.
 double SingleSidedQuotingPolicy.bidQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the bid quote as the highest unmatched bid.
abstract  double QuotingPolicy.bidQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the bid quote
 double DoubleSidedQuotingPolicy.bidQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
          gets the bid quote as the maximum of the highest matched ask and the highest unmatched bid.
 double QuotingPolicy.midQuote(ShoutEngine shoutEngine)
